data.description: This document defines the architecture for the Software and Application Control Management Object v1.0 enabler. This document fulfils the functional capabilities and information flows needed to support this enabler as described in the Software and Application Control Management Object requirements document [SACMO-RD].
The scope of this document is limited to the Enabler Release Definition of SACMO v1.0 according to OMA Release process and the Enabler Release specification baseline listed in section 5.
This document defines requirements for the SACMO enabler.
